title.en: An Aspiration Prayer for the Spread of the Teachings of the Lord of Siddhas, Dzogchen Rinpoche

text.en: You are Ratnaśikhī, the victorious buddha with the jewel-like crown,
text.en-trans: tsen tsam töpé ngendrö jikpa lé

text.en: Whose name alone liberates us from the fears of the lower realms,
text.en-trans: drol dzé gyalwa rinchen tsuktor chen

text.en: Manifesting directly in the form of a vajra master—
text.en-trans: dorjé lobpön zuk su ngönsum jön

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the actual embodiment of Kukkurāja, Lord of Siddhas,
text.en-trans: sang chen gyüdé gyatsö ngadak chok

text.en: The great regent of the buddha of the sixth family, Vajradhara,
text.en-trans: drukpa dorjé chang gi gyaltsab ché

text.en: Who is supreme sovereign over an ocean of secret tantras—
text.en-trans: drubpé wangchuk kuku radza ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the great charioteer who brought to these mountainous lands of snow
text.en-trans: dé sum long gü dzogpachenpö ten

text.en: The Dzogpachenpo teachings of the three classes and nine spaces,
text.en-trans: gangri trö dir drenpé shingta ché

text.en: And achieved the body of supreme transference, Vimalamitra in person—
text.en-trans: po chen kur zheng bi ma mi tra ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the one who led all he met to the indestructible state,
text.en-trans: chakgya chenpö yeshe ngön zikpé

text.en: Through vajra songs expressing the direct realization of the wisdom of Mahāmudrā,
text.en-trans: dorjé dohé dreltsé dorjé sar

text.en: The supremely learned and accomplished Saraha—
text.en-trans: jor khedrub chok sara hapa ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the teacher of secret mantra who received the blessings of the mind transmission
text.en-trans: sang ngak tönpa pema sambha wé

text.en: From Padmasambhava and gained the supreme level of accomplishment,
text.en-trans: gong gyü jin tob drubpa chok nyé né

text.en: The tamer of gods and demons, Langchen Palseng—2
text.en-trans: lhasin drenkhol lang chen pal seng ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the supremely learned and accomplished practitioner of yogic conduct,
text.en-trans: dzutrul tok dé trulnang drak gi ri

text.en: Who, with a magic bolt of lightning, destroyed the delusory appearance of a rocky mountain,
text.en-trans: nyil khé drubpa chok gi tulzhuk chen

text.en: The great master of two languages Langdro Könchok Jungne—3
text.en-trans: ké nyi mawang könchok jungné ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the one who strove to enhance the splendour of the sun-like teachings of Buddha,
text.en-trans: khen lob chögyal sum gyi tukkyé tü

text.en: Which had been introduced through the powerful aspirations of the Abbot Śāntarakṣita, the Precious Master Padmasambhava and the Dharma King Tri Songdetsen,
text.en-trans: lek drang gyalten nyinmor jepé pal

text.en: The actual embodiment of King Tri Ralpachen—
text.en-trans: tenpé tsalak ngadak tri ral ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the supreme emanation of the great siddha Phagtsangwa,4
text.en-trans: dendön ngön du zikpé yeshe kyi

text.en: Who perfected the discipline of taking delusion onto the path,
text.en-trans: timuk lam long tulzhuk tsaldzokpa

text.en: Through the wisdom of seeing directly the meaning of reality—
text.en-trans: drubchen paktsangwa yi ngö trul chok

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the heart-son of the one who attained the level of Vajradhara in a single life, the great Milarepa,
text.en-trans: tsé chik dorjé chang drub mi la jé

text.en: And the holder of the treasury of his instructions from the aural lineage,
text.en-trans: nyen gyü dampé dzö dzin tuk kyi sé

text.en: Teacher from Ngendzong, Changchub Gyalpo—5
text.en-trans: ngen dzong tönpa changchub gyalpo ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the nirmāṇakāya emanation unstained by the womb’s defilements,
text.en-trans: kalzang namdren drukpa sengé tsen

text.en: Who will take the name of Senge as the sixth guide of this fortunate age,
text.en-trans: ngal gyi dribpé ma gö trulpé ku

text.en: The actual embodiment of the supremely accomplished Düsum Khyenpa—6
text.en-trans: drubpa chok nyé dü sum khyenpa ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the one who, through the discipline of seeing the nature of things directly,
text.en-trans: chönyi ngönsum zikpé tulzhuk kyi

text.en: Wandered throughout Oḍḍiyāna and the other lands of this world,
text.en-trans: orgyen yul chok sachö zhing kün nyul

text.en: Lord among siddhas, Lingje Repa, in person—7
text.en-trans: drubpé wangchuk lingjé repa ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the king of accomplished masters who realized the ultimate yoga
text.en-trans: lama chökur tokpé mögü kyi

text.en: Of devotion, in which the lama is realized to be the dharmakāya,
text.en-trans: naljor tarchin tokpé wangchuk chok

text.en: The holder of the teachings of the practice lineage, Taklung Thangpa—8
text.en-trans: drubgyü tendzin taklung tangpa ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the sublime emanation of Orgyen Rangjungpa,9
text.en-trans: tokpa chok nyé nang sem wang du jor

text.en: Who gained supreme accomplishment and mastery over phenomena and mind,
text.en-trans: tatang lasok tulzhuk kün drubpa

text.en: And accomplished all the disciplines, such as the yogic gazes—
text.en-trans: orgyen rangjungpa yi ngö trul chok

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the embodiment of all the buddhas’ wisdom, Manjuśrī,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi khyenrab jampé yang

text.en: Who appeared as a saffron-robed monk in order to preserve the Buddhadharma,
text.en-trans: tubten tsalak ngur mik dzinpé gar

text.en: The actual embodiment of the second buddha Lobzang Drakpa—10
text.en-trans: gyalwa nyipa lobzang drakpa ngö

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Again and again, you are praised in vajra prophecies,
text.en-trans: zhenyang orgyen chökyi gyalpo dang

text.en: As an emanation of the supreme bodhisattvas, the protectors of the three families,
text.en-trans: rik sum sempa chok gi namtrul du

text.en: And of Orgyen, king of Dharma—
text.en-trans: dorjé lung gi yangyang ngakpa yi

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: In short, you are Vajrasattva in person,
text.en-trans: dorna chok dü gyalwa rabjam kyi

text.en: The all-pervading lord of all the buddhas throughout the whole of space and time,
text.en-trans: khyabdak dorjé sem ngö khyö yin chir

text.en: And all the other buddhas and bodhisattvas are but your own magical emanations—
text.en-trans: sé ché gyal kün khyö kyi gyutrul gar

text.en: Dzogchen Rinpoche, may your teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Embodiment of all the buddhas, Pema Rigdzin,11
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün ngö pema rigdzin dang

text.en: Gyurme Thekchok Tenzin Pal Zangpo,12
text.en-trans: gyurmé tek chok tendzin palzangpo

text.en: And Ngedön Tendzin Zangpo,13through your enlightened aspirations,
text.en-trans: ngedön tendzin zangpö tukkyé tü

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Primordial protector, Mingyur Namkhe Dorje,14
text.en-trans: mingyur namkhé dorjé dömé gön

text.en: Supreme all-seeing one, Thubten Chökyi Dorje,15
text.en-trans: künzik tubten chö kyi dorjé chok

text.en: And Jikdral Thekchok Dorje,16through your enlightened aspirations,
text.en-trans: jikdral changchub dorjé tukkyé tü

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Namkha Ösel,17the great tertön Nyima Drakpa,18
text.en-trans: namkha ösal terchen nyima drak

text.en: Rabjam Tenpe Gyaltsen19and the rest—
text.en-trans: rabjam tenpé gyaltsen lasokpé

text.en: Peerless heart-sons, through your powerful aspirations,
text.en-trans: tsungdral tuk kyi sé chok nam kyi tü

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Successive incarnations of Jigme Trinle Özer,20
text.en-trans: jikme trinlé özer rim jön dang

text.en: And of Jigme Mikyö Dorje—21
text.en-trans: jikme mikyö dorjé rim jön sok

text.en: Great masters who hold this lineage, through your powerful aspirations,
text.en-trans: gyüdzin kyé chen nam kyi tukkyé tü

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Patrul Jigme Chökyi Wangpo,
text.en-trans: paltrul jikme chökyi wangpo dang

text.en: Mipham Jampal Gyepe Dorje and the rest,
text.en-trans: mipam jampal gyepé dorjé sok

text.en: Oceans of indisputably learned and accomplished masters, through the power of your aspirations,
text.en-trans: tsödral khedrub gyatsö tukkyé tü

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Successive incarnations of Gyalse Shenpen Thaye,22
text.en-trans: gyalsé zhenpen tayé rim jön dang

text.en: The three tulkus of Kun,23Druk24and Ling25as well as Khyentse, Kongtrul and the rest,
text.en-trans: kün druk ling sum khyen kong nyi lasok

text.en: Regents and supreme incarnations—through the power of your aspirations,
text.en-trans: gyaltsab choktrul nam kyi tukkyé tü

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Khenchen Pema Tashi,26Khenchen Pema Vajra27and the others in this
text.en-trans: pema tashi pema badzra sok

text.en: Golden chain of learned abbots, supreme guides and noble upholders of the teachings—
text.en-trans: dren chok tendzin chö zangwar jönpé

text.en: Through the power of your aspirations,
text.en-trans: khen rab ser ri trengwé tukkyé tü

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Shenpen Chökyi Nangwa28whose enlightened activity caused the teaching and study
text.en-trans: khyepar gya zhung chusum chalak ché

text.en: Of the thirteen classical Indian treatises and other texts to spread throughout the Land of Snows—
text.en-trans: chenyen trinlé gangchen ta ü kün

text.en: Through your powerful aspirations,
text.en-trans: pel dzé zhenpen chökyi nangwé tü

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: With the pure tradition of the three essential foundations of the teachings,29
text.en-trans: tenpé tsalak zhi sum nyam zhé tsang

text.en: And the great ritual practices of Ngagyur Nyingma, kama and terma,
text.en-trans: ngagyur kar ter trin drub chak zhé zang

text.en: Upheld within the great arenas of meditation and learning—
text.en-trans: pong dang lokpé dé chen gyi dzinpé

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The study and teaching of countless approaches to sutra and mantra thriving,
text.en-trans: do ngak chö tsul gyatsö chenyen pel

text.en: The valleys and hillsides filled with renunciate yogins putting an end to delusion,
text.en-trans: jadral trulzhik drubpö risul kheng

text.en: And the holders of the teachings flooding throughout the Land of Snows—
text.en-trans: ten gyü dzinpé gangjong ta ü khyab

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Through unparalleled achievements in the three spheres of learning, meditation and activity,
text.en-trans: khorlo sum gyi trinlé damé chir

text.en: Making such a vital contribution to the Nyingma teachings in the East of Tibet,
text.en-trans: dokham ngagyur tenpé tsalak tu

text.en: The Dharma conch of your fame resounds throughout the three worlds—
text.en-trans: drakpé chö dung dra yi sa sum nyen

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: A great centre of the Dharma, a place where many holders of the teachings
text.en-trans: kah pal nyi sok sa gé ka nying gi

text.en: From Sakya, Gelug, Kagyü and Nyingma monasteries, such as Kathok and Palyul,
text.en-trans: tendzin dumé do ngak rik zhung ché

text.en: Come to study and reflect on the teachings of sutra and mantra and the sciences—
text.en-trans: sen sam dzé né chö kyi dé chenpo

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: In brief, as the force of infinite aspirations and noble intentions
text.en-trans: dorna tön chok shakyé gyalpo yi

text.en: To uphold the complete teachings of the supreme guide,
text.en-trans: tenpa yongsu dzokpa dzinpa la

text.en: The King of the Śākya clan, are brought to fulfilment—
text.en-trans: tukkyé mönlam gyatsö tu drubpa

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Through the power and strength of the vidyādharas of the three lineages of transmission, infinite accomplished siddhas,
text.en-trans: gyü sum rigdzin drubtob gyatsö tsok

text.en: Yidam deities of the nine successive yānas,
text.en-trans: tekpa rimpa gu yi yidam lha

text.en: Ḍākinīs, dharma protectors and guardians,
text.en-trans: khandro chökyong sungmé nütu yi

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: May countless supreme beings arrive in succession, manifesting through the force of their compassion,
text.en-trans: tukjé lé trul kyechok mangdu jön

text.en: May teaching and study forever increase among the holders of the Dharma transmission,
text.en-trans: chö gyü dzin nam chenyen taktu pel

text.en: And may the activity of the protectors and guardians be effective!
text.en-trans: chökyong sungmé trinlé tsulzhin drub

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Through the power of all the buddhas and bodhisattvas of the ten directions,
text.en-trans: chok chü gyalwa sé dangché nam kyi

text.en: Their intention to gain awakening for the benefit of beings,
text.en-trans: drowé döndu changchub tukkyé né

text.en: Their completion of the two accumulations and the perfection of their aspirations,
text.en-trans: tsok nyi mönlam yongsu dzokpé tü

text.en: May the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: dzogchenpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: From this day forth, throughout all our future lives,
text.en-trans: dak sok deng né tserab tamché du

text.en: As we uphold the teachings of the Dzogchen tradition, the very essence of the Buddhadharma,
text.en-trans: gyalten nyingpo gyalwa dzogchenpé

text.en: May we never waver or relax our resolve, even at the cost of our lives,
text.en-trans: tenpa dzin la lü dang sok dor yang

text.en: So that the teachings of this tradition of the Dzogchenpas flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: chungzé tsam zhik lhöpar magyur chik

text.en: Vast and beyond measure are the aspirations of the bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: gyalsé mönlam bumtrak drang yepa

text.en: And yet all of them come together in the supreme wish to preserve the Dharma.
text.en-trans: kündü damchö dzinpé mönlam chok

text.en: Now may the buddhas and their bodhisattva heirs confer the mudrā of supreme generosity,
text.en-trans: drubpé tün gyur sé ché gyal nam kyi

text.en: And make everything conducive to the fulfilment of our prayers:
text.en-trans: chok jin chakgya kyong zhin nangwar dzö

text.en: May the lives of the glorious masters be secure for hundreds of kalpas!
text.en-trans: palden lamé kutsé kal gyar ten

text.en: May the saṅgha who uphold the teachings extend throughout the world!
text.en-trans: tendzin gendün dé yi dzinmar khyab

text.en: May the teachings of the Buddha always be honoured and respected!
text.en-trans: nyé dang kurti ché té tubpé ten

text.en: And may everything be auspicious for them to flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: taktu dar zhing gyepé tashi shok
